means: <古>说（用在第一与第三人称的过去式）

sentence.Network_cn: “我认为错在那些遴选者，”他说。

sentence.Network_en: 'Ask your pardon , sir, you would be very wrong,'quoth Silver.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 请恕我直言, 先生, 那样你就大错特错了. ”

sentence.Network_en: Quoth the raven , nevermore ! - E . A . Poe.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语学习必备词根&nbsp;（一）_supremeky_新浪博客 ... kill 杀死 quoth 说过 quick 快的.
quoter 报价者, quoth 古说, quotes 引文

list.abs: quoth the raven , nevermore !乌鸦说,永不复还!

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: past tense of obsolete quethe 'say, declare', of Germanic origin

entry.def: Quoth means 'said'. Quoth comes before the subject of the verb.

example.tran: “我认为错在那些遴选者，”他说。

auth_sentence.content: They'll have fleet steeds that follow, quoth young Lochinvar.
auth_sentence.res_content: They'll have fleet steeds that follow, quoth young Lochinvar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They'll have fleet steeds that follow, quoth young Lochinvar.

auth_sentence.content: " Quoth candidate Obama: "They think they own this government, but we're here today to take it back.
auth_sentence.res_content: " Quoth candidate Obama: "They think they own this government, but we're here today to take it back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: " Quoth candidate Obama: "They think they own this government, but we're here today to take it back.
